Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.board

Class IslandBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.board.Board
it.polimi.ingsw.model.board.IslandBoard
public class IslandBoard
extends Board
Class that extends Board and can be used to simulate the functioning of the (default) Island Board
Author:
giorgio

    • getCellAt

      public Cell getCellAt​(int x, int y) throws OutOfBoardException
      Method that returns the selected Cell from the Board
      Specified by:
      getCellAt in class Board
      Parameters:
      x - (the x coordinate of the searched Cell)
      y - (the y coordinate of the searched Cell)
      Returns:
      (The Cell corresponding to the selected coordinates. throws exception if it is out of bound).
      Throws:
      OutOfBoardException - (if the searched Cell is out of board Bounds)
